attributes.action: Stop the Term "Care Journey" being used in connection with Patients illness and stay in NHS hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Is anyone else annoyed about the prospect of taking a relative, spouse or friend into an NHS hospital with a  serious complaint or illness only to be presented with the phrase "Care journey" at every turn. People generally spend time in hospitals as a necessity not as a way of passing time. Hopsitals are not Theme Parks, I am not travelling through Tibet providing assisted living to the elderly. Please stop this Government wierdness.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
